tool_description: Unsuprevised Keyword Clustering With Embeddings powered by OpenAI
name: Keyword Clustering
title: Keyword Clustering

api_list.name: Unsupervised Keyword Clustering
api_list.description:
# Unsupervised Keyword Clustering
Is a RESTful API that clusters a list of keywords based on a threshold value. The API takes a list of keywords and a threshold value as inputs and returns a list of clusters, where each cluster contains keywords that are similar to each other based on their semantic meaning.

How to use
Request
The API accepts POST requests with the following parameters:

- keywords (required): a list of keywords, up to 100 in length
- threshold (required): a float between 0 and 2, indicating the threshold value for clustering
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-clustering2.p.rapidapi.com/keywords"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-clustering2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
